article_title: Donna Walker: Fundraising tactics bend the truth about Bill
article_text: Yes, we are attorneys who have primarily represented Alaska's municipalities. So is the incumbent governor who primarily represented the oil industry in the oil spill litigation and as a lobbyist. Bill is a lifetime NRA member and has never supported restrictions on gun rights. Refusing to accept the Medicaid expansion in essence expands Obamacare by forcing many Alaskans into the exchanges. Bill would accept the Medicaid expansion, with the caveat of continued federal funding, because Alaskans' federal tax dollars pay for it, thousands of Alaskans would be aided and many new jobs created.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Recent Democratic fundraising attacks against my husband, independent candidate for governor Bill Walker, are unfounded and denigrate a good, hard-working Alaskan.

og.description: OPINION: Recent Democratic fundraising attacks against my husband, independent candidate for governor Bill Walker, are unfounded and denigrate a good, hard-working Alaskan.
og.title: Donna Walker: Fundraising tactics bend the truth about Bill

article_summary:
So is the incumbent governor who primarily represented the oil industry in the oil spill litigation and as a lobbyist.
Yes, we are attorneys who have primarily represented Alaska's municipalities.
Refusing to accept the Medicaid expansion in essence expands Obamacare by forcing many Alaskans into the exchanges.
Bill would accept the Medicaid expansion, with the caveat of continued federal funding, because Alaskans' federal tax dollars pay for it, thousands of Alaskans would be aided and many new jobs created.
Bill is a lifetime NRA member and has never supported restrictions on gun rights.
